block.para:
This example application analyzes and stores customer feedback cards. Specifically, it fulfills the need of a fictitious hotel in New York City. The hotel receives feedback from guests in various languages in the form of physical comment cards. That feedback is uploaded into the app through a web client.
After an image of a comment card is uploaded, the following steps occur:

listitem.para: Text is extracted from the image using &TEXTRACT;.
&CMP; determines the sentiment of the extracted text and its language.
The extracted text is translated to French using &TSL;.
&POL; synthesizes an audio file from the extracted text.

block.para: The full app can be deployed with the &CDK;. For source code and deployment instructions, see the project in GitHub.
